articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Luke Shaw apologises for 'embarrassing, disgraceful' Manchester United defeat - The Guardian
articles.description: Luke Shaw apologised for a ‘completely unacceptable’ 7-0 loss at Liverpool that he says cannot be allowed to derail Manchester United’s season
articles.content:
Luke Shaw apologised for a completely unacceptable, embarrassing and disgraceful 7-0 loss at Liverpool on Sunday that he says cannot be allowed to derail Manchester Uniteds season.
A week on from wi… [+1955 chars]

articles.author: Jake Boxall-Legge
articles.title: Ten things we learned at the 2023 Bahrain Grand Prix - Motorsport.com
articles.description: A dominant victory from Max Verstappen meant the 2023 Formula 1 season begun much as 2022 finished, but away from the one-sided fight at the front there were plenty of talking points from the curtain-raiser in Bahrain. Motorsport.com picks out 10 things we le…
articles.content: Now that the Bahrain Grand Prix is in the books, the 2023 Formula 1 season is officially up and running. Behind the one-way traffic at the front of the field, as Max Verstappen picked up from where h… [+17794 chars]
